nodes.text: The Nedgarr Bandits were a group of criminals based on the planet of Corellia during the Galactic Civil War. They were named after their leader, Trae Nedgarr, and had a hideout on the outskirts of Coronet City. After the Battle of Yavin, the Nedgarr Bandits used to vandalize and rob local farms, such as Pol Handerin's farm. Circa 1 ABY, Lieutenant Mack Jasper of the Corellian Security Force dispatched a recruit to help Pol Handerin and deal with the Nedgarr Bandits. The CorSec agent recovered stolen grain and killed Trae Nedgarr during the assault of the Nedgarr Bandits Hideout.

The Nedgarr Bandits appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.

The Nedgarr Bandits were added to the game with the expansion Star Wars Galaxies: Trials of Obi-Wan, released on November 1, 2005. They were part of questline that featured the Rogue CorSec plot against the Diktat. This story arc was later slightly revamped with the release of the "Publish 27", on February 15, 2006, as the questline was integrated into the "Legacy Quest", the main questline in the game.
